attributes.action: Use 50% of profits from the National Lottery to fund our front line troops
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In view of the fact that our troops are out fighting and sacrificing their life’s without proper resources I would like to petition the Prime Minister to divert 50% of all profits made on the National Lottery to equip our troops properly. 

It is not right that lottery funding is being used entirely on non-critical spending such as the arts during this time of war. If you want the boys to fight you should back them - this is a way to do this.
